Muldrotha: Sultai Graveyard Lands.desc: Headed by [[Muldrotha, The Gravetide]] this deck plays a lot of lands and gets value from the graveyard. [[Tatyova, Benthic Druid]], [[The Gitrog Monster]] both provide lots of value, and cards like [[Null Profusion]] and [[Recycle]] Give lots of card draw.

Tana Tymna: Token Beatdown Soul Sisters.desc: Wreck face by pumping up [[Tana, the Bloodsower]] and beating face with her and a token army. Also has a lot of lifegain shenanigans for the fun of it. Have fun with stuff like [[Ajani, Caller of the Pride]], [[Huatli, Radiant Champion]], [[Rith, the Awakener]] and [[Power Matrix]].

Ghalta: Rawr.desc: Smash into your opponents with [[Ghalta, Primal Hunger]]. Ramp quick into big beaters ([[Aggressive Mammoth]], [[Forgotten Ancient]], [[Ripjaw Raptor]])  to get him out and devastate with a 12/12 trampler. Has fetchlands because I run [[Panglacial Wurm]] because I think it's funny.

Ramos: 5-color retrace.desc: While this jank deck is headed up by [[Ramos, Dragon Engine]], the real commander of the deck is [[Wrenn and Six]]. Find him, Ult him, and have fun retracing a bunch of oddly fun spells. How do you win? I dunno! Copy some stuff, make some tokens, and see what happens! [[Dark Petition]], [[Tamiyo, the Moon Sage]], and [[Ral, Storm Conduit]] might give you a way another out though...

Kenrith: Big Boy Reanimator.desc: Do you like playing big creatures but are tired of paying huge mana costs? Well here's a deck for you! Using [[Kenrith, the Returned King]]'s last ability, reanimate massive beaters like [[Gisela, Blade of Goldnight]], [[Aurelia, the Warleader]], [[Etali, Primal Storm]], [[Medomai the Ageless]], [[Xenagos, God of Revels]], and [[The Ur-Dragon]] and deal tons of damage!

Kenrith: Group Hug.desc: You're everyone's friend with [[Kenrith, the Returned King]] group hug! All the mana doublers like [[Heartbeat of Spring]], all the card draw in [[Howling Mine]] and [[Minds Aglow]], and... yeah... you can definitely win with this deck, though it might be weird when you win with [[Happily Ever After]], but hey! At least everyone will be happy with you. :)

Feather, the Redeemed: Blink.desc: With [[Feather, the Redeemed]], abuse the reuse of [[Cloudshift]] effects to do a lot of stuff. [[Solemn Simulacrum]], [[Mirror March]], [[Molten Primordial]], [[Chancellor of the Forge]]

Kenrith: Sagas.desc: Reuse Sagas over and over with effects like [[Power Conduit]] and [[Ferropede]].

Muldrotha: Stax.desc: [[Muldrotha, the Gravetide]] stax and hand hate. Psuedo cEDH.

Kenrith: Reanimator Combo.desc: Combo deck that tries to win with [[Dockside Extortionist]] and a sac outlet or [[Necrotic Ooze]] combo lines. Psuedo cEDH.

Kenrith: Lifeline.desc: Tutor out [[Lifeline]], protect it with [[Sharuum the Hegemon]], get loads of value with [[Court Hussar]] and [[Tishana, Voice of Thunder]], and make loads of tokens with [[Elenda, the Dusk Rose]].

Niv-Mizzet Reborn: Blink.desc: With [[Niv-Mizzet Reborn]] at the helm, find [[Feather, the Redeemed]] or [[Izzet Chronarch]] and use [[Ghostly Flicker]] and cousins to do... a lot. [[Keruga, the Macrosage]], [[Yorion, Sky Nomad]], [[Purphoros, God of the Forge]], [[Avenger of Zendikar]]

Kalamax: Shiny Spells and Voltron or Som.desc: Built out of stuff I had lying around, [[Kalamax, the Stormsire]] draws a lot of cards and can do a lot of damage. [[Opportunity]], [[Wavebreak Hippocamp]], [[Fact or Fiction]], [[Growth Spiral]], [[Bounty of Might]]

Kenrith: Soul Sisters.desc: With plenty of [[Soul Warden]] effects, this deck is based around lifegain triggers. Also has some neat engine pieces with +1/+1 counters if you get them together, such as [[Heliod, Sun-Crowned]] and [[Ghave, Guru of Spores]]. Drain with [[Epicure of Blood]] or beat face with [[Archangel of Thune]], [[Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin]], and [[Twinblade Paladin]]. Also plays [[Norin the Wary]].

Kami of the Crescent Moon.desc: The second deck I ever made, [[Kami of the Crescent Moon]] is just a big group draw deck ([[Howling Mine]], [[Font of Mythos]]) with a flicker package. Combo out with [[Peregrine Drake]], [[Archaeomancer]], and [[Ghostly Flicker]].

Yore-Tiller Nephilim.desc: With the unofficial [[Yore-Tiller Nephilim]] at the helm, bring back massive beaters and value cards. [[Dream Eater]], [[Divinity of Pride]], [[Arbiter of the Ideal]], [[Gyruda, Doom of Depths]], [[Athreos, Shroud-Veiled]], [[Reya Dawnbringer]]

Rielle, the Everwise.desc: Play all the bad wheels with [[Rielle, the Everwise]]. [[Read the Runes]], [[Breakthrough]], [[Tolarian Winds]]. Win with commander damage, [[Brallin, Skyshark Rider]], or [[Psychosis Crawler]]

Sisay, Weatherlight Captain: Shrines / U.desc: Get out [[Sanctum of All]] and have fun with way too many shrines. Also get out [[Paradox Haze]], clone it, and have way too many upkeeps. [[Bringer of the Red Dawn]], [[Outlaws' Merriment]], [[Rite of the Raging Storm]], [[Into the Wilds]], [[Stolen Strategy]], [[As Foretold]], [[Junkyo Bell]], [[Gate to the Aether]]

Tormod + Sidar: Desecrated Existence.desc: With [[Sidar, Kondo of Jamuraa]] and [[Tormod, the Desecrator]] at the helm, get out [[Tortured Existence]] and go to town. [[Desecrated Tomb]], [[Golgari Brownscale]], [[Nature's Will]]

Chulane, Teller of Tales.desc: A deck just thrown together from what I had lying around. Classic [[Chulane, Teller of Tales]] deck. Powerful because Chulane but not competitive by any means.

Sedris, the Traitor King: Unearthing the.desc: [[Sedris, the Traitor King]] brings back big boys. [[Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion]], [[Moraug, Fury of Akoum]], [[Terror of the Peaks]]. Keep stuff around with [[Sundial of the Infinite]], [[Thassa, Deep-Dwelling]], [[Conjurer's Closet]], and [[Teferi's Veil]].

Kess, Dissident Mage.desc: Built with stuff I had lying around, [[Kess, Dissident Mage]] plays a lot of spells. Steal stuff, either permanently or temporarily, and play all the nicol bolas planeswalkers.

Kenrith: I am a generous king.desc: [[Kenrith, the Returned King]]: play [[Collective Voyage]] and [[Prosperity]], take care of threats to you by giving gifts ([[Generous Gift]], [[Settle the Wreckage]]) and copy spells. Has won with [[Happily Ever After]].

Kenrith: The Lich King.desc: [[Lich]] and [[Kenrith, the Returned King]] seem like a good combo, no? Protect [[Lich]] with countermagic, hexproof, and play dumb draw cards like [[Ivory Tower]] and [[Gerrard, Capashen]].

Muldrotha: Zombies.desc: Play zombies. [[Muldrotha, the Gravetide]] at the helm.

Kels, Fight Fixer.desc: My shiny pride and joy. [[Kels, Fight Fixer]]. Draw cards, get mana, play stuff, [[Zulaport Cutthroat]] everyone out. GG.
